name: FossFLOW
short_description: Isometric diagram editor for network architecture, cloud infrastructure, and flowcharts.
description: FossFLOW is an isometric diagram editor for creating beautiful infrastructure diagrams. Features include isometric grid, cloud provider icons, network components, auto-save, offline support, export to PNG/SVG, and real-time collaboration potential. Perfect for documenting homelab setups, cloud architectures, or network diagrams.
